Mexican Riviera from Los Angeles | Carnival Cruise Lines | World Travellers - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Mexican Riviera from Los Angeles 9 Days | Los Angeles Roundtrip Sail roundtrip from Long Beach, California on an unforgettable 9-day escape that blends sun-soaked beaches, vibrant culture, and endless onboard fun. Your adventure begins in laid-back Long Beach (Los Angeles) before you head out for two full Fun Days at Sea, the perfect time to explore Carnival Panorama’s world-class entertainment, mouthwatering dining, and signature thrills — from the only Sky Zone™ trampoline park at sea to the breathtaking SkyRide®. Next, dive into the colorful beauty of Puerto Vallarta, where golden beaches and lively charm meet tropical adventure. Then it’s on to Mazatlán, a city that balances rich history with oceanfront fun, and La Paz, a serene gem along the Sea of Cortez surrounded by unspoiled natural beauty. Finally, soak up the iconic coastal magic of Cabo San Lucas, where dramatic rock formations and azure waters promise picture-perfect memories. As your cruise winds down with one last Fun Day at Sea, savor every moment — whether you’re dining on fresh seafood and handcrafted brews, unwinding at Cloud 9 Spa™, or enjoying spectacular onboard shows. Return to Long Beach refreshed, recharged, and ready to tell your story of the ultimate Mexican Riviera getaway — Carnival-style.
